entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
